The lawyer who became the coronavirus 'patient zero' in New York State's Westchester County said in a new interview that, when doctors first examined him, there was "no mention" of the deadly illness that has since infected more than 335,000 in the state.

articles.title: Coronavirus could spread via sexual intercourse as traces were was found in semen - Firstpost
articles.description: We should not be surprised if the virus is found in the semen since this has happened with other viruses like Ebola and Zika.

articles.description: Premier Gladys Berejiklian has urged people to still act as if they, and everyone else, may have the virus when restrictions are eased from Friday.
articles.content:
